name: bear-blog-publisher
description: Publish blog posts to Bear Blog - supports user-provided markdown, AI-generated content, and auto-generated diagrams.
author: OpenClaw Community

BEAR_BLOG_EMAIL.description: Bear Blog email (optional, can also use config file or runtime params)

BEAR_BLOG_PASSWORD.description: Bear Blog password (optional, can also use config file or runtime params)

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: OpenAI API key for AI content generation (optional)

KIMI_API_KEY.description: Kimi API key for AI content generation (optional)

email.description: Bear Blog email (optional if using env vars or runtime params)

password.description: Bear Blog password (optional if using env vars or runtime params)

entry.when: user wants to publish a blog post to Bear Blog
examples: Publish a blog about Python best practices
Write a blog post about my travel experience
Create a blog about system design
